DESCRIPTION: After you gain #b4 Bonding in a combat, the mythical creature will help you.
Whenever you or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains #b1 Aggro. The character with higher Aggro becomes the #yFront, lower one becomes the #yRear.
The character who draws all enemy attacks.
The #yRear is not attacked by enemies. When the Aggro of the #yRear becomes higher than the #yFront, they Switch their position.
